titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B173a_02
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B173a_02

item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)
First century BC to early second century AD (alliances between the tribes of the high plateau and the ASA kingdoms)
Late second to late third centuries AD (wars among the Himyar, Saba and Hadramawt)
Fourth to sixth centuries AD (unification of Yemen under Himyarite rule)
It corresponds to the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans with sub-periods I-IV
First sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Third sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans

Restored full text of the inscription:
1.ydʿʾb | ḏbyn 2.(b)n | šhr | mkrb | qtbn | w= 3.ld | ʿm | w-ʾwsn | w-kḥd w-[d=] 4.hsm | w-tbnw | w-yrfʾ | ʾymnn 5.w-ʾšʾmn | nqz | w-wzl | w-brr | msb(ʾ) 6.w-mnql | ẓrm | b-ʾmr | ʿm | ḏ-šqr | b-ʿm | w-[b] 7.ʾnby | w-b | ʿm | ḏ-rymt | w-b | ʿm | ḏ-šqr | (w)-[b] 8.(ḥ)[w](km | w-b | ḏt | ṣntm |) [w-](b | ḏt | ẓhrn |) [w-](b) [| ḏt | rḥbn] 9.[ʾwsʿm | bn | yṣrʿm | bn | mdhm | tqdm | w-ḥrg | kl] 10.[ʿšq | w-wzl | w-ṣll | mnqln | ẓrm | b-tḥrg | mrʾ-s] 11.[ydʿʾb]

ydʿʾb

1.Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān 2.bin Shahr, ruler of Qatabān and the chil- 3.dren of ʿAmm and of ʾAwsān and of Kaḥid and of [Da-] 4.hasum and of Tubanū and of Yarfaʾ, the southern lands 5.and the northern, has excavated and smoothed and opened up the road 6.and pass of Ẓarim at the command of ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr-by ʿAmm and by 7.ʾAnbay and by ʿAmm Dhū-Raymat and by ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr and [by] 8.Ḥa[w]kam and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim [and] by Dhāt-Ẓahirān and by [Dhāt-Raḥībān.] 9.[ʾAwsʿamm bin Yiṣūrʿamm of the lineage of Madahum led and directed all of] 10.[the cutting and smoothing and paving of the pass of Ẓarim at the directive of his lord,] 11.[Yadaʿʾab.]

Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān
bin Shahr, ruler of Qatabān and the chil-
dren of ʿAmm and of ʾAwsān and of Kaḥid and of Da-
hasum and of Tubanū and of Yarfaʾ, the southern lands
and the northern, has excavated and smoothed and opened up the road
and pass of Ẓarim at the command of ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr-by ʿAmm and by
ʾAnbay and by ʿAmm Dhū-Raymat and by ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr and by
Ḥawkam and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahirān and by Dhāt-Raḥībān.
ʾAwsʿamm bin Yiṣūrʿamm of the lineage of Madahum led and directed all of
the cutting and smoothing and paving of the pass of Ẓarim at the directive of his lord,
Yadaʿʾab.

Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān
bin Shahr, ruler of Qatabān and the chil-
dren of ʿAmm and of ʾAwsān and of Kaḥid and of Da-
hasum and of Tubanū and of Yarfaʾ, the southern lands
and the northern, has excavated and smoothed and opened up the road
and pass of Ẓarim at the command of ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr-by ʿAmm and by
ʾAnbay and by ʿAmm Dhū-Raymat and by ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr and by
Ḥawkam and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahirān and by Dhāt-Raḥībān.
ʾAwsʿamm bin Yiṣūrʿamm of the lineage of Madahum led and directed all of
the cutting and smoothing and paving of the pass of Ẓarim at the directive of his lord,
Yadaʿʾab.

Yadaʿʾab Dhubyān
bin Shahr, ruler of Qatabān and the chil-
dren of ʿAmm and of ʾAwsān and of Kaḥid and of Da-
hasum and of Tubanū and of Yarfaʾ, the southern lands
and the northern, has excavated and smoothed and opened up the road
and pass of Ẓarim at the command of ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr-by ʿAmm and by
ʾAnbay and by ʿAmm Dhū-Raymat and by ʿAmm Dhū-Shaqīr and by
Ḥawkam and by Dhāt-Ṣanatim and by Dhāt-Ẓahirān and by Dhāt-Raḥībān.
ʾAwsʿamm bin Yiṣūrʿamm of the lineage of Madahum led and directed all of
the cutting and smoothing and paving of the pass of Ẓarim at the directive of his lord,
Yadaʿʾab.
